items.title: McDonald's Canada Announces Leadership Transition
items.description: McDonald's Canada today announced that Annemarie Swijtink, currently the Managing Director of McDonald's Netherlands, has been named President & Chief Executive Officer. Michèle Boudria, the current Canadian President & CEO, has announced her retirement after an impressive 40-year career with the company. The leadership changes will take effect on September 1, 2025.

items.title: KeyBanc: Sentiment positive for YUM and SHAK, Investors warming up to CMG, MCD
items.description: Investing.com -- Investor sentiment in the restaurant sector is currently strongest for YUM! Brands and Shake Shack (NYSE:SHAK), according to the latest fieldwork and analysis from KeyBanc Capital Markets.

items.title: Here's What to Expect From McDonald's Next Earnings Report
items.description: McDonald's is set to report its second-quarter results next month, and analysts are projecting a single-digit increase in profits.

items.title: Jim Cramer Flags Bullish Turn on McDonald’s Stock
items.description: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his thoughts on. During the episode, Cramer mentioned the stock in light of Goldman Sachs’ recent coverage. He commented: “Finally, consider McDonald’s. Now, here’s another company that many managers seem to think has lost its way, with the stock going from a… positive performer […]
